conversations.body_text: My correct address is 8951 San Miguel avenue Apt A south gate CA 90280     I input my correct address but I this the app shops automatically changed it to a previous address in mine.  323 7128349   Please don't ship to the cudahy address   That property was demolished to start a housing project and it's currently a dirt lot
Hi jose juarez,    We have made the changes for you. Please confirm.  Jose R Juarez  8951 San Miguel Avenue, Apt. A  South Gate, CA 90280  United States  +1 323-303-1427

Yes that is correct I confirm

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026, 7:24 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi jose juarez,    Alright, thank you for confirming. The Pro X is currently out of stock in our US warehouse and will ship to you next week.
